title: ISic000236. Funerary inscription for Marcus Voluscius Felix
body:
Facsimile Images

1MVOLUSCIO
2MFFELICI

Apparatus criticus

Text from autopsy

English translation

To Marcus Voluscius Felix, son of Marcus.

commentary

The gens Voluscius is rare across the empire, found only in Italy (CIL 10.5150), Rome, (CIL 6.29511), Spain (Olisipo 14), and Sardinia (AE 2003, 805). A tribune of the plebs by the name of M. Volscius Fictor is also recorded by Livy (3.13.1) and Dionysius of Halicarnassus (Ant. Rom. 10.7.1).

bibliography

  • Romano 1829 305 no.18 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002748
  • 10.7448 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589
  • 163 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002137
